help-file.title: "SQUERRIKS SNEAKY WAYS" "SQUERRIK'S SNEAKY WAYS"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <caster> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Dependent on proficiency of caster Type of spell: Protection
This spell provides you with the ability to fade and turn invisibile from the view of others, and grants you the ability to move silently and travel from place to place without others noticing.
